summary: Investigative journalist Jeremy Scahill is pulled into an unexpected journey as he chases down the hidden truth behind America's expanding covert wars.
cast: Nasser Al Aulaqi|Saleha Al Aulaqi|Muqbal Al Kazemi|Abdul Rahman Barman|Saleh Bin Fareed|Andrew Exum|Abdul Ghafoor|Philip Giraldi|Matthew Hoh|Patrick Lang|John McCain|William McRaven|Emile Nakhleh|Malcolm Nance|Barack Obama|Mohamed Qanyare|Mohammed Sabir|Jeremy Scahill|Tony Shaffer|Hajji Sharabuddin|Abdulelah Haider Shaye|Hugh Shelton|Yusuf Mohamed Siad|Jerome Starkey|Mohammed Tahir|Ron Wyden
title: Guerras sucias
